channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: One Second
channel.desc: Comedy 2020 Against the backdrop of the cultural revolution in China, an escaped prisoner chases a homeless girl who has stolen a newsreel in which his daughter appears for a second. Zhang Yi, Liu Haocun, Fan Wei, Yan Li, Xiaochuan Li, Zhang Yimou, Geling Yan, Zhang Yimou.
